summary: REQ-14 tagline appears to be implemented in HeroSection with the exact text. GallerySection was modified to reference the three uploaded images and to add a special 6th card, but the actual static asset files were not added in this diff, and the changes appear to extend beyond just the 6th gallery card (affecting the first 5 cards too).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 3 uploaded images as static frontend assets in the public assets so they are served correctly: Casting-Jewellery-Ring.jpg, Casting_type_gold_pendant_necklace_with_white_stones_by_Mannil_Jewellers__20HzeFw.webp, casting-ladies-gold-rings.jpg.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no added files (Added: 0). GallerySection references these paths, but the corresponding asset files are not present in the diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Added lazy-loading / loading-skeleton behavior and opacity transitions for the first 5 gallery cards (loadedImages state, skeleton div, onLoad handler), affecting other gallery items beyond the specified 6th card.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-15 asked to place uploaded images within the 6th gallery card without affecting other gallery cards, and constraints say to apply changes only to the user-selected elements/XPath. The diff shows modifications applied to the rendering of the first 5 cards as well.
evidence: frontend/src/components/sections/GallerySection.tsx (useState loadedImages; skeleton rendering; onLoad handler for mapped galleryImages)
